50 
51 PredicateFilter::PredicateFilter(const std::string& name, Stage::pointer&& child)
52  : WrapperBase(name, std::move(child)) {
53  auto& p = properties();
54  p.declare<Predicate>("predicate", "predicate to filter wrapped solutions");
55  p.declare<bool>("ignore_filter", false);
56 }
57 
58 void PredicateFilter::init(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
59  InitStageException errors;
60 
61  try {
62  WrapperBase::init(robot_model);
63  } catch (InitStageException& e) {
64  errors.append(e);
65  }
66 
67  const auto& props = properties();
68 
69  // In theory this could be set in interface states
70  // but we enforce it here to keep code flow sane and maintainable
71  if (props.get("predicate").empty()) {
72  InitStageException e(*this, "predicate is not specified");
73  errors.append(e);
74  }
75 
76  if (errors)
77  throw errors;
78 }
79 
80 void PredicateFilter::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
81  const auto& props = properties();
82 
83  // false-positive in clang-tidy 10.0.0: predicate might change comment
84  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(performance-unnecessary-value-param)
85  std::string comment = s.comment();
86 
87  double cost = s.cost();
88  if (!props.get<Predicate>("predicate")(s, comment))
89  cost = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
90 
91  liftSolution(s, cost, comment);
92 }
93 } // namespace stages
94 } // namespace task_constructor
95 } // namespace moveit

lift unmodified child solution (useful for simple filtering)
